Only side effect is that it makes me feel tired, this can be helped if taken with Exedrine.  This is the only migraine reliever that's ever been effective for me.
Catapres (clonidine):A small dose of Catapres will stop the onset of a migraine, if taken before the pain gets really bad. It can also speed up the relief when taken with a pain-killer.

Catapres (clonidine):Clonidine will prevent a migraine for me, if I take it as soon as the headache is starting, and sometimes even helps after it's under way. Of course, the drug does cause wooziness, so I have to be careful about standing up or making other sudden moves. It's very effective, and cheap. Give it a 10.
